But Topaz extricates his arns, claws at Mede's flesh, drawing blood -- and jumps to his fset. Mede starts to rise but Topaz fells him with a blow to the head. The audience rears approval, Maxwell is bouncing up and down in his chair with excitement, enjoying the fight, seemingly unconcerned about Mede's plight. But Hammond looks stricken, his hands clenched. Mede reaches out, grabs Topaz's leg and brings him down. Topaz tries to kick Mede in the groin <= but Mede rolls away in time.
